    • positionSelection

      public void positionSelection​(java.lang.Integer currentPlayerId, java.util.List<Position> allowedPositions, java.lang.String turnPhase, Position currentPosition, java.util.function.Consumer<Position> onCompletion)
      Brief Asks the currently playing player to choose a position where to place a worker
      Specified by:
      positionSelection in interface GameDelegate
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerId - is the id of the player who has to choose
      allowedPositions - contains all the available positions on the map
      turnPhase - specify the kind of operation the player is performing
      currentPosition - is the current position of the selected worker
      onCompletion - places the worker on the cell at the chosen position
